attributes.action: To Leave the EU on 31st October 2019.
attributes.additional_details:
The worst case scenarios will always be scary, but then the best case scenarios are fantastic. I suspect we will have a mixture of things in the middle and some both ways. 
Summary and general overview of the two sides in the EU debate in the UK at the moment.
attributes.background:
Enough is enough, deliver Brexit.
A higher proportion of the UK who vote to Leave because they were not happy with the status quo and where we are heading with the EU, and need a change. 
The Remain side is people who are happy with the status quo and are happy where we are being lead by the EU.
